bug.author: ptrlaszlo
bug.description:
To get help from the community, we encourage using Stack Overflow and the <denchmark-link:https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/tensorflow.js>tensorflow.js</denchmark-link> tag. <denchmark-h:h4>TensorFlow.js version</denchmark-h>
1.3.0 (posenet 2.1.3) <denchmark-h:h4>Browser version</denchmark-h>
Firefox 69.0.3 <denchmark-h:h4>Describe the problem or feature request</denchmark-h>
The <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tfjs-models/tree/master/posenet#via-script-tag>script tag example</denchmark-link> and any other example I tried stopped working. It still worked on Friday, but since then something changed and the returned score on estimated poses are low (~0.03) on an example <denchmark-link:https://www.shutterstock.com/image-photo/picture-confused-young-man-dressed-black-553535785>image</denchmark-link> . I don't see any new version released over the weekend, any ideas what might happened? <denchmark-h:h4>Code to reproduce the bug / link to feature request</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ptrlaszlo/posenetdemo>https://github.com/ptrlaszlo/posenetdemo</denchmark-link>
If you would like to get help from the community, we encourage using Stack Overflow and the <denchmark-link:https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/tensorflow.js>tensorflow.js</denchmark-link> tag. GitHub issues for this repository are tracked in the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tfjs/issues>tfjs union repository</denchmark-link> . Please file your issue there, following the guidance in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tfjs/blob/master/ISSUE_TEMPLATE.md>that issue template</denchmark-link> .

comments.comment: Thank you for reporting , I was also able to verify this.<denchmark-link:https://github.com/tafsiri>@tafsiri</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/nsthorat>@nsthorat</denchmark-link> there are some version upgrades in tfjs to 1.3.0 is this something to do with this error ? <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/43972606/67794750-68836700-fa3a-11e9-9f6d-d6b179f340e0.png></denchmark-link>
We know about the bug and are looking into it. For now you can use an older version of tfjs with the new posenet package (use 1.2.11).
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/nsthorat>@nsthorat</denchmark-link> thank you ,I tried in older versions , same problem.
We just released 1.3.1 which should now work with the latest posenet (make sure you explicitly upgrade tfjs if you are using a lock file since the latest posenet depends on ~1.3.0).
